meanings.meaning: give little offense to the ear

vlive.korean: 춤출 때 진짜 너무 거슬리지 않아요? What about when you dance? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 제목 모하지? 모아지! 2
잠깐만, 이거 왜 이렇게 거슬리지? Wait. Why is this bugging me? 듣기 View video NCT : 경)마크리💚졸업(축
vlive.english: Wait. Why is this bugging me?

vlive.korean: 그렇죠. - 거슬리지 않게 우수님을 위해서 잘 정리하도록 하겠습니다. Right. - I'll clean better for Woosoo. 듣기 View video JJHOLICMEDIA : HAPPYWOOSOODAY2
vlive.english: Right. - I'll clean better for Woosoo.

vlive.korean: 오히려 더 거슬리지 않아요? - 잠 와요. - 진짜야? - 응. Isn't it bothersome? - It makes you sleepy. - Really? - Yes. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Girls' Generation X LieV - 소녀시대 10주년 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Isn't it bothersome? - It makes you sleepy. - Really? - Yes.

vlive.korean: 저거 그렇게 거슬리십니까? Does that bother you that much? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 쉼표방
vlive.english: Does that bother you that much?

examples.korean: If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us. (Hermann Hesse) 발음듣기 누군가를 미워하고 있다면, 그 사람의 모습 속에 보이는 자신의 일부분을 미워하는 것이다. 나의 일부가 아닌 것은 거슬리지 않는다. (헤르만 헤세, 행복명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us. (Hermann Hesse) 발음

examples.korean: He tried not to sail against the wind. 발음듣기 그는 대세를 거슬리지 않으려고 노력했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He tried not to sail against the wind. 발음

examples.korean: The building is not an unsightly affair 발음듣기 그 건물은 눈에 거슬리지는 않는다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: The building is not an unsightly affair 발음

examples.korean: Let him keep his own opinion. 발음듣기 거슬리지 않게 해 두게 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: Let him keep his own opinion. 발음

examples.korean: You are sure it does not bother you? 발음듣기 정말 당신의 신경에 거슬리지 않는다고 확신합니까? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. AngK(kohr****) Web Collection
examples.english: You are sure it does not bother you? 발음
